name: io-api-testing
description: A test suite for integration testing over the IO api infrastructure
author: Emanuele De Cupis

scripts.generate:api:backend: rimraf generated/backend && mkdir -p generated/backend && gen-api-models --api-spec https://raw.githubusercontent.com/pagopa/io-backend/master/api_backend.yaml --no-strict --out-dir generated/backend --request-types --response-decoders
scripts.generate:api:backend-definitions: rimraf generated/definitions/backend && mkdir -p generated/definitions/backend && gen-api-models --api-spec https://raw.githubusercontent.com/pagopa/io-backend/master/api_backend.yaml --out-dir ./generated/definitions/backend --no-strict --request-types --response-decoders  && gen-api-models --api-spec https://raw.githubusercontent.com/pagopa/io-backend/master/api_public.yaml --out-dir ./generated/definitions/backend
